Package hw12

Class Summary
GrayScaleColorChooserPanel Gray scale color chooser pane.
ImageFrame Represents the outer frame of the application.
ImagePanel The ImagePanel class extends the JPanel and contains the functinality to display and modify the images.
ImageSelector The image selector class.
Main The Main class
MyImage Custom Image class that provides reading/writing gray-scale images.
Pixels Pixel store data structure.
Pixels.Pixel Pixel data structure containing the pixel coordinates and color.
Polygon The polygon class.
